alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Davis Mountains Foothills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Brewster County through 930 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Marathon, or 27 miles east of Alpine, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marathon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Davis Mountains Foothills
